Login success

Title:

User login successful after logout

Description:

logged in user tries to logout successful. upon logging out, user tries to login again. when successful user can access all secured features e.g. add purchase, view settings, etc.

Preconditions:

User is on login page.

Steps to Execute:

  1. user fills out details as following,
  2. emailId: sardar.vallabhbhai.patel@example.com
  3. password: $Ardar123
  4. user clicks on login button
  5. login is successful, and logout link is displayed.
  6. user clicks on logout link
  7. user logs out successfully.
  8. user attempts login with same credential immediately

Expected Outcome:

  • The loading indicator is displayed for few seconds (~5).
  • user is navigated to secured homepage.
  • secured links like, expenses, payment accounts, settings, logout, etc. are showing and navigational.

Impact Area:

frontend

  • login page
  • homepage
  • logout page

backend api

  • login api
  • stats api
  • userdetails api
  • logout api

Type of Test:

  • Integration
  • Demo site testable

Tags:

feature
  • login
  • logout
execution
  • manual
impact
  • low
type
  • positive

Affected Versions:

v0.1.0
